item.title: Flowers of Bangalore
item.description: Bangalore is called the Garden City of India. How often do you walk into a garden? I visit often. I envy you if you own a garden at home! Every day you can spot a lot of flowers and trees during transit to work, casual walk, etc â€¦ In the evening, trees welcome all passer-bys with chosen fallen flowers in the pathway. Especially golden flowers from Copper pod. Trees and flowers are predominant in the buzzing part of the city.
